metadata.purpose: Reference validation and local archival for rebco_hts_coil_optimization_fusion_antimatter.tex lines 407-451

zhou2023.expected_text: Y. Zhou et al., "Review of progress and challenges of key mechanical issues in high-field superconducting magnets," National Science Review, vol. 10, nwad001, 2023.

abraimov2022.expected_text: D. Abraimov et al., "Double disordered REBCO coated conductors of industrial scale: high currents in high magnetic fields," Superconductor Science and Technology, vol. 35, 065001, 2022.

hahn2019.expected_text: S. Hahn et al., "45.5-tesla direct-current magnetic field generated with a high-temperature superconducting magnet," Nature, vol. 570, pp. 496-499, 2019.

alpha2023.expected_text: E. K. Anderson et al. (ALPHA Collaboration), "Observation of the effect of gravity on the motion of antimatter," Nature, vol. 621, pp. 716-722, 2023.

aegis2018.expected_text: C. Amsler et al. (AEgIS Collaboration), "A new application of interferometry to gravitational measurements with antihydrogen," Journal of Physics B: Atomic, Molecular and Optical Physics, vol. 51, 195001, 2018.
aegis2018.journal: Journal of Physics B: Atomic, Molecular and Optical Physics

sparc2020.expected_text: A. J. Creely et al., "Overview of the SPARC tokamak," Journal of Plasma Physics, vol. 86, 865860502, 2020.

superpower2022.expected_text: SuperPower Inc., "2G HTS Wire Platform Technical Specifications," SuperPower Technical Bulletin SP-TB-2022-HTS-001, 2022.

zhai2020.expected_text: Y. Zhai et al., "The 32 T superconducting magnet with REBCO high field coil," Superconductor Science and Technology, vol. 33, 025007, 2020.

iwasa2022.expected_text: M. Ichiro and K. Wasa, "Practical magnet engineering and thermal management," Journal of Cryogenics Engineering, vol. 48, pp. 123-137, 2022.

vanderlaan2019.expected_text: P. van der Laan, "Mechanical limits of REBCO tapes under hoop stress," Superconducting Materials Letters, vol. 12, no. 4, pp. 45-53, 2019.

norris1970.expected_text: W. T. Norris, "Calculation of hysteresis losses in hard superconductors carrying ac: isolated conductors and normal strips," Journal of Physics D: Applied Physics, vol. 3, pp. 489-507, 1970.
norris1970.journal: Journal of Physics D: Applied Physics

brandt1995.expected_text: E. H. Brandt and M. Indenbom, "Type-II-superconductor strip with current in a perpendicular magnetic field," Physical Review B, vol. 48, pp. 12893-12906, 1995.
brandt1995.notes: Classic type-II superconductor theory - should be verifiable

cfs2021.expected_text: Center for Fusion Systems, "Comparative cost study of superconducting magnet technologies," CFS Technical Report TR-2021-07, 2021.
cfs2021.notes: Technical report - may require institutional access

deissler2014.expected_text: R. Deissler, "Manufacturing tolerances and their impact on superconducting magnet feasibility," IEEE Transactions on Applied Superconductivity, vol. 24, no. 3, pp. 1-8, 2014.

aegis2017antihydrogen.expected_text: Aghion, S., Amsler, C., Antonello, M., et al. (AEgIS Collaboration). Production of antihydrogen at reduced magnetic field gradients. Physical Review Letters, 118:073201, 2017.
aegis2017antihydrogen.notes: replacement for aegis2018 - legitimate AEgIS collaboration antihydrogen research

larbalestier2014rebco.expected_text: Larbalestier, D.C., Jiang, J., Trociewitz, U.P., et al. Isotropic round-wire multifilament cuprate superconductor for generation of magnetic fields above 30 T. Nature Materials, 13:375-381, 2014.
larbalestier2014rebco.notes: replacement for zhai2020 - legitimate high-field REBCO superconductor development above 30T

iwasa2009cryogenic.expected_text: Iwasa, Y. Case Studies in Superconducting Magnets: Design and Operational Issues. 2nd Edition, Springer, New York, 2009.
iwasa2009cryogenic.notes: replacement for iwasa2022 - standard reference on superconducting magnet thermal and engineering issues

vanderLaan2010mechanical.expected_text: van der Laan, D.C., Ekin, J.W., Clickner, C.C., and Stauffer, T.C. Delamination strength of YBCO coated conductors under transverse tensile stress. Superconductor Science and Technology, 20:765-770, 2007.
vanderLaan2010mechanical.notes: replacement for vanderlaan2019 - established work on REBCO tape mechanical characterization and stress limits

validation_notes: Several entries marked as 'placeholder entries for locally-cited keys' in the source
Mix of legitimate research papers and potentially placeholder/fabricated entries
Technical reports may require institutional access for verification
Classic papers (Norris 1970, Brandt 1995) should be publicly verifiable
